author: sgoeschl
msg: [EMAIL-87] HtmlEmail invokes java.net.URL.equals(Object), which blocks to do domain name resolution. This is avoided by using "url.toExternalForm().equals()" instead of "url.equals()".

author: markt
msg: Handle chunked POSTs. If maxPostSize is exceeded, a 500 results.
